content: उत्क्षिप्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Thrown upwards, tossed, raised. {@--2@} Held up, supported; <ls>R. 15. 83.</ls> {@--3@} Seized or overcome with, distracted by, struck with; विस्मय° <ls>Ratn. 1</ls>; so लोभ°, अनुराग°. {@--4@} Demolished, destroyed. {@--5@} Thrown out, rejected, dismissed. --प्तः The thorn apple, the Dhattūra plant.
